SaveName: Xia: Embers + Missions and Powers Expansion
LuaScript:
function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {
		sp=startedPlayers, tdtao=trackedDrawersThatAreOpen,
		spd=statePairDictionary,
		vaft=victoryAndFameTracker, go=gameOver
	}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
	if saved_data ~= "" and saved_data ~= nil then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data (see below for what these do)
		startedPlayers = loaded_data.sp
		trackedDrawersThatAreOpen = loaded_data.tdtao
		statePairDictionary = loaded_data.spd
		victoryAndFameTracker = loaded_data.vaft
		gameOver = loaded_data.go
    else
		--Set up default information if there is no save data
		--Tracks which players colors have hit start
        startedPlayers = {}
		--Used to track what animation loop objects are in
		trackedDrawersThatAreOpen = {}
		--Used to link stated objects to triggering effects
		--First number is guid of button, second is guid of stated object
		--The GUIDs change as the states change
		statePairDictionary = {
			--Green
			["68ee6c"]="82e883", ["94619d"]="ea7936", ["b91013"]="9b5a2e",
			["ship1Green"]="4b37db", ["ship2Green"]="0b5573",
			--Red
			["fd2ed1"]="70ab15", ["f98d9f"]="07e9db", ["475d82"]="5280fe",
			["ship1Red"]="cded1a", ["ship2Red"]="956b69",
			--White
			["e66030"]="99ee47", ["4857fe"]="24c8b6", ["f41aea"]="332021",
			["ship1White"]="ac56e7", ["ship2White"]="e44f4d",
			--Blue
			["9948fe"]="a90e78", ["95eab8"]="cc0cf3", ["99e094"]="152005",
			["ship1Blue"]="94895e", ["ship2Blue"]="7c88c3",
			--Purple
			["9a3698"]="eac664", ["eeba0d"]="b8807b", ["8f1bc7"]="e32141",
			["ship1Purple"]="869517", ["ship2Purple"]="e6f7da",
		}
		--Tracks positions of fame markers and victory marker
		victoryAndFameTracker = {
			["Green"]=-1, ["Red"]=-1, ["White"]=-1,
			["Blue"]=-1, ["Purple"]=-1, ["Victory"]=-2.5
		}
		--Tracks if game has ended, used for flashing victory colors
		gameOver = false
    end

	--Used to highlight victory marker
	victoryMarker = getObjectFromGUID("a6aa3d")
	victoryMarkerInt = 1
	upORdown = "down"
	gameOverCount = 1

	--Shuffle some stuff if there are 0 player who started
    local shuffle=true
    for _, _ in pairs(startedPlayers) do
        shuffle=false
        break
    end
    if shuffle == true then
        broadcastToAll("Cards and items bags have been shuffled.", {0.7,0.7,0.7})
        for _, guid in ipairs(itemToShuffleGUIDList) do
    		getObjectFromGUID(guid).shuffle()
    	end
    end

	lockoutList = {}
	startInteractableOff()
	startInteractableOn()
	createButtons()
end



--Spawn function



--Coroutine that handles the spawning of items from bags
function spawnPlayerObjects()
	local color = Global.getTable("coroutineColorPass").buttonColor
	local buttonGUID = Global.getTable("coroutineColorPass").buttonGUID
	local playerHand = Player[color].getPlayerHand()
	--Turn on player mat to instruction "page"
	getObjectFromGUID(startEffectTriggerList[color]).AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
	--Turn on the cube animation
	local cubeAnimator = getObjectFromGUID(remoteButtonDictionary[buttonGUID])
	cubeAnimator.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(1)
	cubeAnimator.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
	--Enable bags for cubes and coins. Drawers are handled seperately
	for _, guid in ipairs(enableStartInteractiveBagsList[color]) do
		getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = true
	end
	--Spawn all objects for player but fame marker and instruction cards
	for _, data in ipairs(startObjectsFromBagsList) do
		local bag = nil
		if data.coin_bag then
			bag = getObjectFromGUID(data.bag_guid[color])
		else
			bag = getObjectFromGUID(data.bag_guid)
		end
		for _, opos in ipairs(data.pos) do
			--Determine pos using offset pos (opos) and hand pos (playerHand)
			local pos = {}
			pos.x = playerHand.pos_x + playerHand.trigger_right_x * opos[1] + playerHand.trigger_forward_x * opos[3]
			pos.y = opos[2] - spawnHeightOffset
			pos.z = playerHand.pos_z + playerHand.trigger_right_z * opos[1] + playerHand.trigger_forward_z * opos[3]
			if data.coin_bag then pos.y = pos.y + spawnHeightOffset end
			--Determine rot using offset rotation (orot) and hand rotation (prot)
			local orot = data.rot
			local prot = {playerHand.rot_x, playerHand.rot_y, playerHand.rot_z}
			local rot = {orot[1]+prot[1],orot[2]+prot[2],orot[3]+prot[3]}
			--Coroutine params added here
			local params = {color=color, tint=data.tint}
			if data.coin_bag then params.skip_raise = true end
			if data.lock then params.lock = true end

			bag.takeObject({
				position=pos, rotation=rot, params=params,
				callback="afterSpawnPlayerObjects", callback_owner=Global,
			})
			wait(0.2)
		end
	end
	--Repositions fame marker
	local fameMarker = getObjectFromGUID(fameMarkerInteractableList[color])
    fameMarker.setPositionSmooth({0,3.114,0})
    --Make instruction cards visible
    for _, guid in ipairs(instructionCardList[color]) do
        getObjectFromGUID(guid).AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(1)
    end

	return 1
end

--Callback function after takeObject on spawn bags
function afterSpawnPlayerObjects(object, params)
	local color = params.color
	local tint = params.tint
	local skipRaise = params.skip_raise
	local lock = params.lock
	local quickPos = params.quickPos
	local interOff = params.inter_off
	--Color name
	if object.getName()~="" and object.getName()~="[f96105]1000.Cr[-]" and object.getName()~="[f96105]5000.Cr[-]" then
		object.setName(addBB(object.getName(), color))
	end
	--Tint object if it is marked as needing tint
	if tint == true then
		object.setColorTint(tintReferenceList[color])
	end
	--Locks object if triggered
	if lock then
		object.setLock(true)
	end
	--Raise up out of the table
	if not skipRaise then
		local pos = object.getPosition()
		pos.y = pos.y + spawnHeightOffset
		object.setPositionSmooth(pos)
	end

	if interOff then
		object.interactable = false
	end
end


--Tying buttons to animations/sounds/changing states



--Decides what kind of button was pressed to trigger the desired function
--This is the master function, triggering all other functions in this section
function buttonPressFunctionActivation(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor)
	if masterButtonEntry.tLoopOn then
		--missile/shield/engine/blaster Drawer
		drawerActivated(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor, false)
	elseif masterButtonEntry.useRemoteIndex then
		--Dice/disposal drawer
		drawerActivated(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor, true)
	elseif masterButtonEntry.abilityRotate then
		--Ability buttons 1/2/3
		abilityStateChange(buttonEnt)
	elseif masterButtonEntry.npcRotate then
		--NPC button
		npcLoopChange(buttonEnt)
	elseif masterButtonEntry == masterButtonList.bountyButton then
		--Bounty board
		bountyBoardChange(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry)
	elseif masterButtonEntry == masterButtonList.shipAddButton then
		--Ship +
		changeShipForPlayer("add", buttonColor)
	elseif masterButtonEntry == masterButtonList.shipSubButton then
		--Ship -
		changeShipForPlayer("sub", buttonColor)
	elseif masterButtonEntry.isFame then
		--fame + or -
		moveFameMarker(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor)
	elseif masterButtonEntry.isVictory then
		--victory + or -
		moveVictoryMarker(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry)
	end
end

--For opening/closing missile/shield/engine/blaster drawers
function drawerActivated(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor, usesRemoteIndex)
	local buttonGUID = buttonEnt.getGUID()
	local targetEnt = getObjectFromGUID(remoteButtonDictionary[buttonGUID])
	--Set up index needed to operate drawer
	local openIndex, closeIndex = nil, nil
	if usesRemoteIndex == false then
		openIndex = masterButtonEntry.tLoopOn
		closeIndex = masterButtonEntry.tLoopOff
	else
		openIndex = remoteDrawerAnimationIndexList[buttonColor].tLoopOn
		closeIndex = remoteDrawerAnimationIndexList[buttonColor].tLoopOff
	end
	--operate drawer
	if trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] then
		--Close drawer
		targetEnt.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(closeIndex)
		targetEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
		trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] = nil
		for i, guid in ipairs(interactableToggleList[buttonGUID]) do
			getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = false
		end
	else
		--Open drawer
		targetEnt.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(openIndex)
		targetEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
		trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] = true
		for i, guid in ipairs(interactableToggleList[buttonGUID]) do
			getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = true
		end
	end
	--Moves/empties trash if button was for trashcan
	if cycleTrashDictionary[buttonGUID] then
		local trashcan = getObjectFromGUID(cycleTrashDictionary[buttonGUID])
		local pos = trashcan.getPosition()
		if trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] then
			trashcan.setPosition({pos.x, -0.54, pos.z})
		else
			trashcan.setPosition({pos.x, 60, pos.z})
			trashcan.reset()
		end
	end
end

--For scrolling through abilities
function abilityStateChange(buttonEnt)
	local buttonGUID = buttonEnt.getGUID()
	local statedEnt = getObjectFromGUID(statePairDictionary[buttonGUID])
	local stateList = statedEnt.getStates()
	local currentStateIndex = determineCurrentState(stateList)
	if currentStateIndex == #stateList + 1 then
		local newObjReference = statedEnt.setState(1)
		statePairDictionary[buttonGUID] = newObjReference.getGUID()
	else
		local newObjReference = statedEnt.setState(currentStateIndex+1)
		statePairDictionary[buttonGUID] = newObjReference.getGUID()
	end
end

--For scrolling through NPCs
function npcLoopChange(buttonEnt)
	local buttonGUID = buttonEnt.getGUID()
	local guidsForLoopChange = remoteButtonDictionary[buttonGUID]
	local currentIndex = getObjectFromGUID(guidsForLoopChange[1]).AssetBundle.getLoopingEffectIndex()
	local nextIndex = nil
	if currentIndex + 1 == #getObjectFromGUID(guidsForLoopChange[1]).AssetBundle.getLoopingEffects() then
		nextIndex = 0
	else
		nextIndex = currentIndex + 1
	end
	for _, guid in ipairs(guidsForLoopChange) do
		getObjectFromGUID(guid).AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(nextIndex)
	end
end

--For raising/lowering bounty board
function bountyBoardChange(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry)
	--bTrigOn=0, bTrigOff=1, bLoopOn=1, bLoopOff=2
	local buttonGUID = buttonEnt.getGUID()
	if trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] then
		--Close drawer
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(masterButtonEntry.bLoopOff)
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrigOff)
		trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] = nil
	else
		--Open drawer
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(masterButtonEntry.bLoopOn)
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrigOn)
		trackedDrawersThatAreOpen[buttonGUID] = true
	end
end

--Moves up or down player's ship state to the next/previous ship
function changeShipForPlayer(addORsub, buttonColor)
	local ship1GUID = statePairDictionary["ship1"..buttonColor]
	local ship2GUID = statePairDictionary["ship2"..buttonColor]
	local ship1, ship2 = getObjectFromGUID(ship1GUID), getObjectFromGUID(ship2GUID)
	local stateList = ship1.getStates()
	local currentState = determineCurrentState(stateList)
	local nextState = nil
	if addORsub == "add" then
		if currentState < #stateList+1 then nextState = currentState + 1
		else nextState = 2 end
	else
		if currentState > 2 then nextState = currentState - 1
		else nextState = #stateList + 1 end
	end
	local ship1New = ship1.setState(nextState)
	local ship2New = nil
    if ship2 then
        ship2New = ship2.setState(nextState)
    end
	ship1New.interactable = false
    getObjectFromGUID(shipSwitchReferenceList[buttonColor]).AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(nextState-1)
	statePairDictionary["ship1"..buttonColor] = ship1New.getGUID()
    if ship2New then
       statePairDictionary["ship2"..buttonColor] = ship2New.getGUID()
   end
end

function moveFameMarker(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, color)
	local fameEnt = getObjectFromGUID(fameMarkerInteractableList[color])
	local addORsub = masterButtonEntry.addORsub
	local currentFame = victoryAndFameTracker[color]
	if aboveOrBeyondVictory()==false then
		if currentFame==-1 and addORsub=="sub" then
			--Can't go lower
			buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(3)
		elseif currentFame==20 and addORsub=="add" then
			--Can't go higher
			buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(3)
		elseif addORsub == "sub" then
			--subracts
			victoryAndFameTracker[color] = victoryAndFameTracker[color] - 1
		else
			--adds
			victoryAndFameTracker[color] = victoryAndFameTracker[color] + 1
		end
		--Move piece
		fameEnt.setRotationSmooth({0,-15-15*victoryAndFameTracker[color],0})
		fameEnt.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(0)
		--Check for victory
		if victoryAndFameTracker[color] == victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] then
			gameOver = true
			victoryMarker.highlightOn(stringColorToRGB(color))
			broadcastToAll("The [b]"..color.."[/b] player is the victor!", stringColorToRGB(color))
			fameEnt.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(1)
			fameEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
		end
	else
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(3)
	end
end

function moveVictoryMarker(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry)
	--victoryMarker
	local addORsub = masterButtonEntry.addORsub
	local currentVictory = victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"]
	if currentVictory==-2.5 and addORsub=="sub" then
		--first press, can't go lower
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(3)
	elseif currentVictory==-2.5 and addORsub=="add" then
		--first press, set to space 0
		victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] = 0
        victoryMarker.interactable = false
	elseif currentVictory==0 and addORsub=="sub" then
		--Can't go lower
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(3)
	elseif currentVictory==20 and addORsub=="add" then
		--Can't go higher
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(3)
	elseif addORsub == "sub" then
		--subracts
		victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] = victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] - 1
	else
		--adds
		victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] = victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] + 1
	end
	victoryMarker.setRotationSmooth({0,-37.5-15*victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"],0})
end

--Triggers when objects leave containers, triggers kaching sound for coins
function onObjectLeaveContainer(container)
    local targetGUID = container.getGUID()
    for soundGUID, containerGUIDList in pairs(kerchingBagList) do
        for _, containerGUID in ipairs(containerGUIDList) do
            if containerGUID == targetGUID then
                getObjectFromGUID(soundGUID).AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
                break
            end
        end
    end
end



--Interactable section



--Handles the disabling of all items at the start.
--Items will be re-enabled from there if needed
function startInteractableOff()
	--Generic list of always off stuff
	for _, guid in ipairs(interactableDisableListStart) do
        if getObjectFromGUID(guid) then
            getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = false
        end
	end
	--All bags for drawers for each player color
	for _, tableOfGUIDs in pairs(interactableToggleList) do
		for _, guid in ipairs(tableOfGUIDs) do
			getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = false
		end
	end
	--All bags for cubes and credits for each player color
	for _, tableOfGUIDs in pairs(enableStartInteractiveBagsList) do
		for _, guid in ipairs(tableOfGUIDs) do
			getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = false
		end
	end
    --Turns off victory marker if it has been moved
    if victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] ~= -2.5 then
        victoryMarker.interactable = false
    end

end

--Items are re-enabled here
function startInteractableOn()
	--handles all drawers, enables bags for open drawers
	for buttonGUID, _ in pairs(trackedDrawersThatAreOpen) do
        if buttonGUID~="5bcaa7" and buttonGUID~="e579d8" and buttonGUID~="c1d210" and buttonGUID~="1b7426" and buttonGUID~="f224dc" then
    		for _, bagGUID in ipairs(interactableToggleList[buttonGUID]) do
                getObjectFromGUID(bagGUID).interactable = true
    		end
        end
	end
	--Enables cube and credit bags for players who have started
	for color, _ in pairs(startedPlayers) do
		for _, guid in ipairs(enableStartInteractiveBagsList[color]) do
			getObjectFromGUID(guid).interactable = true
		end
	end
end



--Utility/Lookup functions



--Used by coroutines to wait X time
function wait(time)
  local start = os.time()
  repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Adds bb code to a string to color the text in-game
function addBB(string, color)
	if string ~= nil and color ~= nil then
		returnString = bbCodeReferenceList[color] .. string .. "[-]"
		return returnString
	else
		print("Error in addBB. Missing string or color.")
		return nil
	end
end

--Timer, used to re-enable button pressing
function disableTimerLockout(params)
	Timer.destroy("TimerLockoutTimer"..params.guid)
	lockoutList[params.guid] = nil
end

--Used to find what index number an object is on. Takes obj.getStates()
function determineCurrentState(stateList)
	local index = nil
	local sort_func = function(a,b) return a.id < b.id end
    table.sort(stateList, sort_func)
	for i, state in ipairs(stateList) do
		if i ~= state.id then
			return i
		end
	end
	return #stateList + 1
end

--Determine if pieces are past the victory marker
function aboveOrBeyondVictory()
	if victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] == -2.5 then
		return false
	else
		for key, val in pairs(victoryAndFameTracker) do
			if key~="Victory" and val>=victoryAndFameTracker["Victory"] then
				return true
			end
		end
	end
	return false
end

--Used only for highlighted victory marker changing color
function update()
	if gameOver == false then
	    if upORdown == "down" then victoryMarkerInt = victoryMarkerInt - 0.003
		else victoryMarkerInt = victoryMarkerInt + 0.003 end
		if victoryMarkerInt <= 0.05 then upORdown = "up"
		elseif victoryMarkerInt >= 0.4 then upORdown = "down" end
	    victoryMarker.highlightOn({victoryMarkerInt,victoryMarkerInt,0})
	end
end



--Click functions for buttons



--Triggered by button presses, set up using setVar in button creation
--This is the gatekeeper, deciding if a button can be pressed, what sounds get made
--If it decides a button does something, then it passes it on to buttonPressFunctionActivation
function buttonWasPressed(buttonEnt, masterButtonKey, buttonColor, clickerColor)
	local masterButtonEntry = masterButtonList[masterButtonKey]
	local buttonGUID = buttonEnt.getGUID()

	if clickerColor == "Black" or clickerColor == buttonColor then
		--if the player is allowed to press this color of button
		if startedPlayers[buttonColor]==true or masterButtonKey=="victoryAddButton" or masterButtonKey=="victorySubButton" then
			--if start has been pressed for this color
			if masterButtonKey == "startButton" then
				--start was already pressed, not allowed to do it again, error
				buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrigError)
				broadcastToColor("This player has already pressed start.", clickerColor, stringColorToRGB(clickerColor))
			else
				--Start has been pressed, button should now do something
				if not lockoutList[buttonGUID] then
					--Activate button function and start lockout timer
					if masterButtonEntry.bTrig then
						buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrig)
						buttonPressFunctionActivation(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor)
					else
						buttonPressFunctionActivation(buttonEnt, masterButtonEntry, buttonColor)
					end
					--Adds a timer to prevent button spamming
					lockoutList[buttonGUID] = true
					--Timer.destroy("TimerLockoutTimer")
					Timer.create({
						identifier="TimerLockoutTimer"..buttonGUID, function_owner=Global,
						function_name="disableTimerLockout", delay=masterButtonEntry.delay,
						parameters={guid=buttonGUID}
					})
				else
					--Timer is locking out button press
					broadcastToColor("Press buttons more slowly, please.", clickerColor, stringColorToRGB(clickerColor))
				end
			end
		else
			--if start has not been pressed for this color
			if masterButtonKey == "startButton" then
				--start button pressed for the first time by valid player
				buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrig)
				startedPlayers[buttonColor] = true
				Global.setTable("coroutineColorPass", {buttonColor=buttonColor, buttonGUID=buttonEnt.getGUID()})
				startLuaCoroutine(Global, "spawnPlayerObjects")
			else
				--other button pressed, start hasn't, error
				buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrigError)
				broadcastToColor("You must press start before you may press other buttons.", clickerColor, stringColorToRGB(clickerColor))
			end
		end
	else
		--if the player is not allowed to press this color of button
		buttonEnt.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(masterButtonEntry.bTrigError)
		broadcastToColor("You may not press another player's buttons unless you are in the black seat.", clickerColor, stringColorToRGB(clickerColor))
	end
end




--Button creation



--Creates buttons using masterButtonList
function createButtons()
	for key, button in pairs(masterButtonList) do
		for i, guid in ipairs(button.guid) do
			local funcName = guid
			local buttonEnt = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
			buttonEnt.createButton({
				click_function=funcName, function_owner=nil,
				position=button.p, rotation=button.r, height=button.h, width=button.w
			})
			local func = nil
			if key ~= "victoryAddButton" and key ~= "victorySubButton" then
				func = function(_,clickerColor)
					--Button entity/entry from masterButtonList/color of owner/color of person who clicked
					buttonWasPressed(buttonEnt, key, colorOrderList[i], clickerColor)
				end
			else
				func = function(_,clickerColor)
					buttonWasPressed(buttonEnt, key, clickerColor, clickerColor)
				end
			end
			Global.setVar(funcName, func)
		end
	end
end



--Data tables



--Contains data on where to spawn starting objects
startObjectsFromBagsList = {
	--Armed marker
	{pos={
		{-8.055,-0.288,17.156}, {-7.287,-0.288,17.156},
		{-6.516,-0.288,17.156}, {-5.739,-0.288,17.156}
	}, rot={0,180,0}, bag_guid="9247c1", tint=true},
	--Energy Tracker
	{pos={{-2.64,-0.177,13.306}}, rot={0,90,0}, bag_guid="77b1f7", tint=true},
	--Inpulse token
	{pos={{-6.862,-0.207,12.377}}, rot={0,180,0}, bag_guid="d44d9b"},
	--Replication token
	{pos={{-11.65,-0.26,16.02}}, rot={0,180,0}, bag_guid="da20cc"},
	--[[Instruction card 1
	{pos={{0.011,1.1,0.002}}, rot={0.005,194.99,359.998}, bag_guid="54467b", lock=true},
	--Instruction card 2
	{pos={{0.011,1.1,0.002}}, rot={0.005,194.99,359.998}, bag_guid="15bbc9", lock=true},]]
	--Credits from bag
	{pos={
		{6.92,-0.16,19.08},{6.92,-0.16,16.55},{6.91,-0.16,14.05}
	}, rot={0,0,0}, coin_bag=true,
	bag_guid = {

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Assetbundle_Bag
ObjectStates.Description:
[-]At the start of the game, each player draws a token from this token rack to determine who will control the 3 NPC characters. 
[f96105]----------[-]
In a 4 or 5 player game, not everyone will control an NPC ship.
[f96105]----------[-]
Contents are auto shuffled during start up.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Assetbundle
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
    local flag = getObjectFromGUID("7edd4f")
    if flag.AssetBundle.getLoopingEffectIndex() ~= 1 then
        flag.AssetBundle.playLoopingEffect(1)
        flag.AssetBundle.playTriggerEffect(0)
    end
end

ObjectStates.Description:
[-]When a Sector tile with an Exploration space is drawn. Draw an Exploration Token from this rack and place it face down on that space.
[f96105]----------[-]
The first player to move their ship onto this Exploration space claims the Exploration Token. Flip it face up, claim your reward, and place the Exploration Token onto your ship mat.
[f96105]----------[-]
 Contents are auto shuffled at start up.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--Clicker Roller Universal      by: MrStump
setting = {print={}} --Don't edit this line

--To change the die that this tool rolls, right click it and hit reset
--Then drop the die you want onto the tool (it is an infinite bag)
--Die must have rotation values! (from the Gizmo Tool)

--Edit the below variables to modify the functionality of this device

--Disables the button, places indicator of roll locations (true or false)
setting.setup = false

--How far from the center of the device the dice are spawned
setting.radius = 2
--How wide of an arch the dice are placed on, in degrees (1-360)
setting.arc = 120
--Where center of the arc is around the tool is placed (0=bottom, 180=top)
setting.rotation = 180
--Height above tool die is spawned
setting.height = 1.5
--Scaling factor for die being spawned (1 is normal, 0.5 is 1/2 size, 2 is 2x)
setting.scale = 1

--Maximum dice that can be spawned by this tool (-1 is infinite)
setting.maxCount = 10
--Delay (seconds) after a click that the roll is done (0.5 or more)
setting.rollDelay = 1.2
--Time before dice are cleaned up (0 is instant, -1 won't clean them)
setting.cleanupDelay = 5

--If it dyes the die the color of the player clicking (true or false)
setting.colorDie = false

--Turn on/off printing of the player who rolled (true or false)
setting.print.player = true
--Turn on/off printing of individual results
setting.print.individual = true
--Turn on/off printing of "total" results (adding them together)
setting.print.total = true
--Use player color when printing roll results:
setting.print.playerColor = true

--If this tool will work with other copies of itself (true or false)
--Any roller clicked by the same color player will be treated as the same
setting.coop = true



--Edit beyond this point only if you have accepted Lua into your heart, amen



--Save function (triggered when adding a die or clearing the dice)
function onSave()
    local tableToSave = {}
    for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            table.insert(tableToSave, die.getGUID())
        end
    end
    saved_data = JSON.encode(tableToSave)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        --Remove any old dice from the table
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        for _, dieGUID in ipairs(loaded_data) do
            local die = getObjectFromGUID(dieGUID)
            if die ~= nil then
                destroyObject(die)
            end
        end
        spawnedDice = {}
    else
        spawnedDice = {}
    end

    math.randomseed(os.time())
    createButtons()
end



--Spawn dice for rolling



function click_roll(_, color)
    --Dice spam protection check
    local denyRoll = false
    if setting.maxCount > 0 and #spawnedDice >= setting.maxCount then
        denyRoll = true
    end
    if rollInProgress==nil and denyRoll==false and anyRollInProgress(color)==false then
        --Find dice positions, moving previously spawned dice if needed
        --local angleStep = arcTotalLength / (#currentDice+1)
        for i, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
            local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(i, #spawnedDice+1)
            local pos = self.positionToWorld(pos_local)
            die.setPositionSmooth(pos)
        end

        --Spawns dice
        local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(#spawnedDice+1, #spawnedDice+1)
        local spawnedDie = self.takeObject({
            position = self.positionToWorld(pos_local),
            rotation = randomRotation(),
        })

        --Setup die that was just spawned
        spawnedDie.setScale({setting.scale,setting.scale,setting.scale})
        spawnedDie.setLock(true)
        if setting.colorDie == true then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end
        --This line stops the die from re-entering the bag
        spawnedDie.script_state = " "

        rollTimerUpdate({color=color})

        --Update data
        table.insert(spawnedDice, spawnedDie)
        updateGlobalTable(color)
        updateRollTimers(color)

    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        --If after roll but before cleanup
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        --If button click is denied due to roll (or 2 many dice)
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end

function rollTimerUpdate(param)
    --Timer starting
    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
    Timer.create({
        identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=setting.rollDelay,
        function_name="timer_rollDice", function_owner=self,
        parameters = param
    })
end



--Rolling activation and in-progress monitoring



--Rolls all the dice and then launches monitoring
function timer_rollDice(p)
    rollInProgress = true
    function coroutine_rollDice()
        for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
            die.setLock(false)
            die.randomize()
            wait(0.1)
        end

        monitorDice(p.color)

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_rollDice")
end


--Monitors dice to come to rest
function monitorDice(color)
    function coroutine_monitorDice()
        repeat
            local allRest = true
            for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
                if die ~= nil and die.resting == false then
                    allRest = false
                end
            end
            coroutine.yield(0)
        until allRest == true

        if areOtherRollersRolling(color)==true and setting.coop==true then
            --If other coop rollers are rolling
            rollingHasStopped = true
            return 1
        else
            --If roll is complete and no further waiting is required
            if setting.print.individual==true or setting.print.total==true then
                displayResults(color)
            end
            finalizeRoll({color=color})
            if setting.coop == true then finalizeCoopRolls(color) end
        end

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_monitorDice")
end

function finalizeRoll(p)
    local color = p.color
    rollingHasStopped = nil --Used for coop communication
    rollInProgress = false --Used for button lockout
    updateGlobalTable(nil)

    --Auto die removal
    if setting.cleanupDelay > -1 then
        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID(),
            function_name="cleanupDice", function_owner=self,
            delay=setting.cleanupDelay,
        })
    end
end



--After roll actions (printing/cleanup)



--Removes the dice
function cleanupDice()
    for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            destroyObject(die)
        end
    end

    rollInProgress = nil
    spawnedDice = {}

    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
end

function displayResults(color)
    local s, valueTable = "", {}

    addAllSpawnedDice(color)

    --Player name
    if setting.print.player == true then
        s = Player[color].steam_name
        if setting.print.individual==true or setting.print.total==true then
            s = s .. "    " .. string.char(9679) .. "    "
        end
    end

    --Assemble values into table and order
    if setting.print.individual==true or setting.print.total==true then
        --Get values in table
        for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
            if die ~= nil then
                table.insert(valueTable, tostring(die.getRotationValue()))
            end
        end
        --Order them
        alphanumsort(valueTable)
    end

    --Individual values
    if setting.print.individual == true then
        --Add values to string
        for i, value in ipairs(valueTable) do
            s = s .. value
            if i < #valueTable then
                s = s .. ", "
            end
        end
        if setting.print.total==true then
            s = s .. "    " .. string.char(9679) .. "    "
        end
    end

    --Total (will be void if there are no numbers)
    if setting.print.total == true then
        local total, hadNumber = 0, false
        for _, value in ipairs(valueTable) do
            if tonumber(value) ~= nil then
                total = total + tonumber(value)
                hadNumber = true
            end
        end
        if hadNumber == true then
            s = s .. tostring(total)
        else
            s = s .. "---"
        end
    end

    --Establish color
    local stringColor = {1,1,1}
    if setting.print.playerColor == true then
        stringColor = stringColorToRGB(color)
    end
    --Broadcast result
    broadcastToAll(s, stringColor)
end



--Coop communication



--Updates global rolling table with its information
function updateGlobalTable(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable == nil then
            Global.setTable("UCR_communication", {[self]=color})
        else
            currentTable[self] = color
            Global.setTable("UCR_communication", currentTable)
        end
    end
end

--Updates roll timers for all devices currently rolling
function updateRollTimers(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable != nil then
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    who.call("rollTimerUpdate", {color=color})
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

--Check if any other roller is rolling
function areOtherRollersRolling(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable == nil then
            --If there is no table in global
            return false
        else
            --If there is, check the contents
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                --Check if the entry is for this color (and not self)
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    --Check for if the other object is still rolling
                    if who.getVar("rollingHasStopped") ~= true then
                        return true
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Check if any other roller is rolling
function anyRollInProgress(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable == nil then
            --If there is no table in global
            return false
        else
            --If there is, check the contents
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                --Check if the entry is for this color (and not self)
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    --Check for if the other object is still rolling
                    if who.getVar("rollInProgress") ~= nil then
                        return true
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Activate the finalize step on all dice of this color
function finalizeCoopRolls(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable != nil then
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                if c==color then
                    who.call("finalizeRoll", {color=color})
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

--Combines all spawnedDice tables from all coop rollers
function addAllSpawnedDice(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable != nil then
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    theirSpawnedDice = who.getTable("spawnedDice")
                    if theirSpawnedDice ~= nil then
                        for _, die in ipairs(theirSpawnedDice) do
                            table.insert(spawnedDice, die)
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end



--Utility functions



--Finds a local point an an arc, given which point and the total # of points
function getLocalPointOnArc(i, points)
    --This evens it out
    i = i - 0.5
    --What the length of arc this points at (how far along an arc)
    local angle = setting.arc/(points)
    --How much to rotate the angle around the tool
    local offset = -setting.arc/2 + setting.rotation
    --Converting those 2 elements into a local position
    local x = math.sin( math.rad(angle*i+offset) ) * setting.radius
    local y = setting.height
    local z = math.cos( math.rad(angle*i+offset) ) * setting.radius
    return {x=x,y=y,z=z}
end

--Gets a random rotation vector
function randomRotation()
    --Credit for this function goes to Revinor (forums)
    --Get 3 random numbers
    local u1 = math.random();
    local u2 = math.random();
    local u3 = math.random();
    --Convert them into quats to avoid gimbal lock
    local u1sqrt = math.sqrt(u1);
    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);

    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Sorts numbers/strings alphabeticall (does not handle decimals or leading 0s)
function alphanumsort(o)
    local function padnum(d) return ("%03d%s"):format(#d, d) end
    table.sort(o, function(a,b)
    return tostring(a):gsub("%d+",padnum) < tostring(b):gsub("%d+",padnum) end)
    return o
end



--Button creation



--Spawns the roll button or the "display roll locations" for setup mode
function createButtons()
    if setting.setup ~= true then
        self.createButton({
            click_function="click_roll", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.05,0}, height=650, width=650, color={1,1,1,0}
        })
    else
        for i=1, math.ceil(setting.arc/30) do
            local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(i, math.ceil(setting.arc/30))
            self.createButton({
                click_function="none", function_owner=self,
                position=pos_local, height=0, width=0, label=string.char(9673),
                font_size=1000, font_color={0.5,0.5,0.5}
            })
        end
    end
end

setting.radius = 2

setting.arc = 120
--Where center of the arc is around the tool is placed (0=bottom, 180=top)
setting.rotation = 180
--Height above tool die is spawned
setting.height = 1.5
--Scaling factor for die being spawned (1 is normal, 0.5 is 1/2 size, 2 is 2x)
setting.scale = 1

--Maximum dice that can be spawned by this tool (-1 is infinite)
setting.maxCount = 10
--Delay (seconds) after a click that the roll is done (0.5 or more)
setting.rollDelay = 1.2
--Time before dice are cleaned up (0 is instant, -1 won't clean them)
setting.cleanupDelay = 5

--If it dyes the die the color of the player clicking (true or false)
setting.colorDie = false

--Turn on/off printing of the player who rolled (true or false)
setting.print.player = true
--Turn on/off printing of individual results
setting.print.individual = true
--Turn on/off printing of "total" results (adding them together)
setting.print.total = true
--Use player color when printing roll results:
setting.print.playerColor = true

--If this tool will work with other copies of itself (true or false)
--Any roller clicked by the same color player will be treated as the same
setting.coop = true

    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);

    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Sorts numbers/strings alphabeticall (does not handle decimals or leading 0s)
function alphanumsort(o)
    local function padnum(d) return ("%03d%s"):format(#d, d) end
    table.sort(o, function(a,b)
    return tostring(a):gsub("%d+",padnum) < tostring(b):gsub("%d+",padnum) end)
    return o
end



--Button creation



--Spawns the roll button or the "display roll locations" for setup mode
function createButtons()
    if setting.setup ~= true then
        self.createButton({
            click_function="click_roll", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.05,0}, height=650, width=650, color={1,1,1,0}
        })
    else
        for i=1, math.ceil(setting.arc/30) do
            local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(i, math.ceil(setting.arc/30))
            self.createButton({
                click_function="none", function_owner=self,
                position=pos_local, height=0, width=0, label=string.char(9673),
                font_size=1000, font_color={0.5,0.5,0.5}
            })
        end
    end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--Clicker Roller Universal      by: MrStump
setting = {print={}} --Don't edit this line

--To change the die that this tool rolls, right click it and hit reset
--Then drop the die you want onto the tool (it is an infinite bag)
--Die must have rotation values! (from the Gizmo Tool)

--Edit the below variables to modify the functionality of this device

--Disables the button, places indicator of roll locations (true or false)
setting.setup = false

--How far from the center of the device the dice are spawned
setting.radius = 2
--How wide of an arch the dice are placed on, in degrees (1-360)
setting.arc = 120
--Where center of the arc is around the tool is placed (0=bottom, 180=top)
setting.rotation = 180
--Height above tool die is spawned
setting.height = 1.5
--Scaling factor for die being spawned (1 is normal, 0.5 is 1/2 size, 2 is 2x)
setting.scale = 1

--Maximum dice that can be spawned by this tool (-1 is infinite)
setting.maxCount = 10
--Delay (seconds) after a click that the roll is done (0.5 or more)
setting.rollDelay = 1.2
--Time before dice are cleaned up (0 is instant, -1 won't clean them)
setting.cleanupDelay = 5

--If it dyes the die the color of the player clicking (true or false)
setting.colorDie = false

--Turn on/off printing of the player who rolled (true or false)
setting.print.player = true
--Turn on/off printing of individual results
setting.print.individual = true
--Turn on/off printing of "total" results (adding them together)
setting.print.total = true
--Use player color when printing roll results:
setting.print.playerColor = true

--If this tool will work with other copies of itself (true or false)
--Any roller clicked by the same color player will be treated as the same
setting.coop = true



--Edit beyond this point only if you have accepted Lua into your heart, amen



--Save function (triggered when adding a die or clearing the dice)
function onSave()
    local tableToSave = {}
    for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            table.insert(tableToSave, die.getGUID())
        end
    end
    saved_data = JSON.encode(tableToSave)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        --Remove any old dice from the table
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        for _, dieGUID in ipairs(loaded_data) do
            local die = getObjectFromGUID(dieGUID)
            if die ~= nil then
                destroyObject(die)
            end
        end
        spawnedDice = {}
    else
        spawnedDice = {}
    end

    math.randomseed(os.time())
    createButtons()
end



--Spawn dice for rolling



function click_roll(_, color)
    --Dice spam protection check
    local denyRoll = false
    if setting.maxCount > 0 and #spawnedDice >= setting.maxCount then
        denyRoll = true
    end
    if rollInProgress==nil and denyRoll==false and anyRollInProgress(color)==false then
        --Find dice positions, moving previously spawned dice if needed
        --local angleStep = arcTotalLength / (#currentDice+1)
        for i, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
            local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(i, #spawnedDice+1)
            local pos = self.positionToWorld(pos_local)
            die.setPositionSmooth(pos)
        end

        --Spawns dice
        local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(#spawnedDice+1, #spawnedDice+1)
        local spawnedDie = self.takeObject({
            position = self.positionToWorld(pos_local),
            rotation = randomRotation(),
        })

        --Setup die that was just spawned
        spawnedDie.setScale({setting.scale,setting.scale,setting.scale})
        spawnedDie.setLock(true)
        if setting.colorDie == true then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end
        --This line stops the die from re-entering the bag
        spawnedDie.script_state = " "

        rollTimerUpdate({color=color})

        --Update data
        table.insert(spawnedDice, spawnedDie)
        updateGlobalTable(color)
        updateRollTimers(color)

    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        --If after roll but before cleanup
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        --If button click is denied due to roll (or 2 many dice)
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end

function rollTimerUpdate(param)
    --Timer starting
    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
    Timer.create({
        identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=setting.rollDelay,
        function_name="timer_rollDice", function_owner=self,
        parameters = param
    })
end



--Rolling activation and in-progress monitoring



--Rolls all the dice and then launches monitoring
function timer_rollDice(p)
    rollInProgress = true
    function coroutine_rollDice()
        for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
            die.setLock(false)
            die.randomize()
            wait(0.1)
        end

        monitorDice(p.color)

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_rollDice")
end


--Monitors dice to come to rest
function monitorDice(color)
    function coroutine_monitorDice()
        repeat
            local allRest = true
            for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
                if die ~= nil and die.resting == false then
                    allRest = false
                end
            end
            coroutine.yield(0)
        until allRest == true

        if areOtherRollersRolling(color)==true and setting.coop==true then
            --If other coop rollers are rolling
            rollingHasStopped = true
            return 1
        else
            --If roll is complete and no further waiting is required
            if setting.print.individual==true or setting.print.total==true then
                displayResults(color)
            end
            finalizeRoll({color=color})
            if setting.coop == true then finalizeCoopRolls(color) end
        end

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_monitorDice")
end

function finalizeRoll(p)
    local color = p.color
    rollingHasStopped = nil --Used for coop communication
    rollInProgress = false --Used for button lockout
    updateGlobalTable(nil)

    --Auto die removal
    if setting.cleanupDelay > -1 then
        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID(),
            function_name="cleanupDice", function_owner=self,
            delay=setting.cleanupDelay,
        })
    end
end



--After roll actions (printing/cleanup)



--Removes the dice
function cleanupDice()
    for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            destroyObject(die)
        end
    end

    rollInProgress = nil
    spawnedDice = {}

    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
end

function displayResults(color)
    local s, valueTable = "", {}

    addAllSpawnedDice(color)

    --Player name
    if setting.print.player == true then
        s = Player[color].steam_name
        if setting.print.individual==true or setting.print.total==true then
            s = s .. "    " .. string.char(9679) .. "    "
        end
    end

    --Assemble values into table and order
    if setting.print.individual==true or setting.print.total==true then
        --Get values in table
        for _, die in ipairs(spawnedDice) do
            if die ~= nil then
                table.insert(valueTable, tostring(die.getRotationValue()))
            end
        end
        --Order them
        alphanumsort(valueTable)
    end

    --Individual values
    if setting.print.individual == true then
        --Add values to string
        for i, value in ipairs(valueTable) do
            s = s .. value
            if i < #valueTable then
                s = s .. ", "
            end
        end
        if setting.print.total==true then
            s = s .. "    " .. string.char(9679) .. "    "
        end
    end

    --Total (will be void if there are no numbers)
    if setting.print.total == true then
        local total, hadNumber = 0, false
        for _, value in ipairs(valueTable) do
            if tonumber(value) ~= nil then
                total = total + tonumber(value)
                hadNumber = true
            end
        end
        if hadNumber == true then
            s = s .. tostring(total)
        else
            s = s .. "---"
        end
    end

    --Establish color
    local stringColor = {1,1,1}
    if setting.print.playerColor == true then
        stringColor = stringColorToRGB(color)
    end
    --Broadcast result
    broadcastToAll(s, stringColor)
end



--Coop communication



--Updates global rolling table with its information
function updateGlobalTable(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable == nil then
            Global.setTable("UCR_communication", {[self]=color})
        else
            currentTable[self] = color
            Global.setTable("UCR_communication", currentTable)
        end
    end
end

--Updates roll timers for all devices currently rolling
function updateRollTimers(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable != nil then
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    who.call("rollTimerUpdate", {color=color})
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

--Check if any other roller is rolling
function areOtherRollersRolling(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable == nil then
            --If there is no table in global
            return false
        else
            --If there is, check the contents
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                --Check if the entry is for this color (and not self)
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    --Check for if the other object is still rolling
                    if who.getVar("rollingHasStopped") ~= true then
                        return true
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Check if any other roller is rolling
function anyRollInProgress(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable == nil then
            --If there is no table in global
            return false
        else
            --If there is, check the contents
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                --Check if the entry is for this color (and not self)
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    --Check for if the other object is still rolling
                    if who.getVar("rollInProgress") ~= nil then
                        return true
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Activate the finalize step on all dice of this color
function finalizeCoopRolls(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable != nil then
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                if c==color then
                    who.call("finalizeRoll", {color=color})
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

--Combines all spawnedDice tables from all coop rollers
function addAllSpawnedDice(color)
    if setting.coop==true then
        local currentTable = Global.getTable("UCR_communication")
        if currentTable != nil then
            for who, c in pairs(currentTable) do
                if who~=self and c==color then
                    theirSpawnedDice = who.getTable("spawnedDice")
                    if theirSpawnedDice ~= nil then
                        for _, die in ipairs(theirSpawnedDice) do
                            table.insert(spawnedDice, die)
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end



--Utility functions



--Finds a local point an an arc, given which point and the total # of points
function getLocalPointOnArc(i, points)
    --This evens it out
    i = i - 0.5
    --What the length of arc this points at (how far along an arc)
    local angle = setting.arc/(points)
    --How much to rotate the angle around the tool
    local offset = -setting.arc/2 + setting.rotation
    --Converting those 2 elements into a local position
    local x = math.sin( math.rad(angle*i+offset) ) * setting.radius
    local y = setting.height
    local z = math.cos( math.rad(angle*i+offset) ) * setting.radius
    return {x=x,y=y,z=z}
end

--Gets a random rotation vector
function randomRotation()
    --Credit for this function goes to Revinor (forums)
    --Get 3 random numbers
    local u1 = math.random();
    local u2 = math.random();
    local u3 = math.random();
    --Convert them into quats to avoid gimbal lock
    local u1sqrt = math.sqrt(u1);
    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);

    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Sorts numbers/strings alphabeticall (does not handle decimals or leading 0s)
function alphanumsort(o)
    local function padnum(d) return ("%03d%s"):format(#d, d) end
    table.sort(o, function(a,b)
    return tostring(a):gsub("%d+",padnum) < tostring(b):gsub("%d+",padnum) end)
    return o
end



--Button creation



--Spawns the roll button or the "display roll locations" for setup mode
function createButtons()
    if setting.setup ~= true then
        self.createButton({
            click_function="click_roll", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.05,0}, height=650, width=650, color={1,1,1,0}
        })
    else
        for i=1, math.ceil(setting.arc/30) do
            local pos_local = getLocalPointOnArc(i, math.ceil(setting.arc/30))
            self.createButton({
                click_function="none", function_owner=self,
                position=pos_local, height=0, width=0, label=string.char(9673),
                font_size=1000, font_color={0.5,0.5,0.5}
            })
        end
    end
end
